title: New Library Opening
description: Our new library will be opening on 15th August. Join us for a grand opening ceremony!

title: Science Fair
description: The annual Science Fair will be held on 20th August. Showcase your experiments and projects.

title: Parent-Teacher Meeting
description: Join us for the Parent-Teacher Meeting on 25th August to discuss student progress and goals.

title: Annual Sports Day
description: Our Annual Sports Day is scheduled for 30th August. Participate in various sports and win exciting prizes!
